text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode where concept is-a _AccessMedicalDevice

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _AccessMedicalDeviceAccessMedicalDeviceA device used to allow access to a part of a body

name: AccessMedicalDevice
title: AccessMedicalDevice
description: A device used to allow access to a part of a body
